title: 2 Simple Ways to Leave a Group Chat on WhatsApp

steps.title: Open WhatsApp and tap Chats.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp and tap Chats . On Android, this is at the top. On iOS, this is at the bottom. If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address or phone number and password to do so now. You can leave a group on WhatsApp without anyone (except for the admin) knowing.

steps.title: Tap the group chat you want to leave.
steps.content: Tap the group chat you want to leave. You'll see a list of recent messages from newest to oldest.

steps.title: Tap the group name.
steps.content: Tap the group name. This is at the top.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Exit Group.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Exit Group . This is in red at the bottom of the screen. Group members can still check the group details for current members, but they won't be notified that you left.

steps.title: Open the WhatsApp desktop app and click Chats.
steps.content: Open the WhatsApp desktop app and click Chats . If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address or phone number and password to do so now. [1] X Research source You can also use WhatsApp in a browser at https://web.whatsapp.com/ . When you leave a group chat on WhatsApp, only the group admin(s) will be notified.

steps.title: Click the group chat you want to leave.
steps.content: Click the group chat you want to leave. You'll see a list of recent messages from newest to oldest.

steps.title: Click the group name.
steps.content: Click the group name. This is at the top.

steps.title: Click the "leave" icon.
steps.content: Click the "leave" icon. This looks like a red rectangle with a left-pointing arrow.

steps.title: Click Exit.
steps.content: Click Exit . You'll leave the group chat.
